column4: only thing I wish vlc did was audio compression; I hate it when I constantly have to turn the volume up and down while watching a dvd
?.. i've never had to do that
If I don't turn it up and down all the time, then either the loud parts (like explosions) are too loud or the soft parts (like whispering) are too quiet and I can't hear them.
I'm still happy. I love VLC. just wish it had that one additional feature. then it'd be perfect for my use
